template.name: Template UniFi Controller
template.description: Template to monitor the UniFi Controller via API. Set the macros as needed. Readonly permission are enough.

item.name: Discover UniFi Sites
UniFi Up2Date Version
item.description: The current unifi controller Version (Windows Version) provided by webrequest.

trigger_prototype.name: UniFi LAN Device missing {ITEM.LASTVALUE} APs on {HOSTNAME} site [{#DESC}]
